course_title: Topics in Afr American Studies: Imagining Democracy
class_notes:
(Same as POLS 394 3)
(This is the second part of a two-part course. Students will have internships at civic organizations based on the work completed during Fall 2023 in the Imagining Democracy Lab.)
(Students must have taken and satisfactorily completed the course in FS 2023)
course_description: This course explores one of a wide range of topics pertaining to the African American experience in the fields of human and civil rights, social and literary texts, and the social sciences.
sections: Class Nbr: 3393, Section #: 6, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 11:30a-2:15p, Instructor: Anderson/Fraga, Status: Open
